original_text: Thou which hast kept with thy servant David my father that which thou hast promised him; and spakest with thy mouth, and hast fulfilled it with thine hand, as it is this day.
korean_text: 주께서 주의 종 내 아버지 다윗에게 허락하신 말씀을 지키시되 주의 입으로 말씀하신 것을 손으로 이루심이 오늘과 같으니이다

sentences.original_text: Thou which hast kept with thy servant David my father
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 종 다윗 내 아버지와 함께 지키셨으니

sentences.original_text: that which thou hast promised him
and hast fulfilled it with thine hand
